It's more of the whole stock markets sentiments. 
In an struggling markets, people tend to be GUN-SHY buying a new ticker, even if they know it's a great investment, they won't buy in yet..
That's how it is. 
In troubling times, investors tends to go with more TRADITIONAL plays like $NVDA $TSLA $MSFT etc etc etc..
